project.name: Orion Edge Gateway
project.scope: API gateway, rate limiting, auth integration

sections.title: Project Overview & Objectives
sections.goal: Understand the interviewee's view of Orion Edge Gateway's purpose, scope, and success metrics.
sample_questions: Can you walk me through the main objectives of the Orion Edge Gateway project?
How do you define success for the build phase in relation to the SLA-ORI-02 p95 latency target?
What are the key customer problems this gateway is intended to solve?

sections.title: SLA Alignment & Customer Impact
sections.goal: Explore how the project aligns with organizational SLAs and customer expectations.
sample_questions: How are you ensuring compliance with SLA-ORI-02 during development?
What monitoring or alerting measures are in place to detect SLA breaches early?
How do you prioritize backlog items that directly affect latency and availability?

sections.title: Integration & Dependencies
sections.goal: Identify integrations with other systems and how dependencies are managed.
sample_questions: Which upstream and downstream services does Orion Edge Gateway depend on?
Can you describe any cross-project coordination, for example with Aegis IAM for auth integration?
Have you encountered any dependency-related blockers, and how were they resolved?

sections.title: Operational Readiness & Risk Management
sections.goal: Evaluate readiness for deployment and risk mitigation strategies.
sample_questions: What operational runbooks, such as RB-GW-011, are critical for this project?
How do you assess and mitigate risks like the MTLS handshake bug documented in GW-4821?
What is your approach to limiting BLAST_RADIUS during rollouts?

sections.title: Trade-offs & Decision-Making
sections.goal: Discuss key trade-offs made during the build phase and their rationale.
sample_questions: Can you share a recent decision where you had to balance feature scope against performance targets?
How do you weigh customer feature requests against technical debt reduction?
What evidence or metrics do you use to back such decisions, and how do you communicate them to stakeholders?
